acct.description: The web account associated with the change.

acct:site.description: The site or service associated with the account.

acct:user.description: The unique identifier for the account.

client.description: The source address used to make the account change.

client:ipv4.description: The source IPv4 address used to make the account change.

client:ipv6.description: The source IPv6 address used to make the account change.

time.description: The date and time when the account change occurred.

pv.description: The prop=valu of the account property that was changed. Valu should be the old / original value, while the new value should be updated on the inet:web:acct form.
